title: WarfareAmbience1 SoundEffect
description: This is a Warfare Ambience sound effects loop package designed to depict modern warfare and World War II-themed battle scenarios, including gunfights, artillery bombardments, and other war-related atmospheres.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/jrVFib5bn4Q


This is a Warfare Ambience sound effects loop package designed to depict modern warfare and World War II-themed battle scenarios, including gunfights, artillery bombardments, and other war-related atmospheres.

  • 42 Audio, 42 Cue


File.

  • Fireworks 1
  • ShootingRange 1
  • SmallScale FireFight 1
  • Warfare Ambience Close 9
  • Warfare Ambience Far 9
  • Warfare AutoGunFire 3
  • Warfare WW2 Close 9
  • Warfare WW2 Far 9
